title: Disha case encounter: Nine things Hyderabad cops allegedly lied about - The News Minute
content:
1. Disha case encounter: Nine things Hyderabad cops allegedly lied about  The News Minute
  2. Shocking Revelations By SC Probe Panel, SC Probe Panel Calls Hyderabad Encounter 'Staged'  India Today
  3. SC-appointed Commission holds 2019 Telangana encounter fake  Times of India
  4. 2019 Hyderabad Encounter: Cops' "Intent To Cause Death," Says Report  NDTV
  5. Hyderabad cops knew two accused were 15 years old before shooting them, says panel  The News Minute
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The report of the Supreme Court-appointed inquiry commission, which probed the extra judicial killing of the four accused in the case of gang rape and murder of a veterinarian in Hyderabad in December 2019, was made public on May 20, Friday. The four accused – Mohammad Arif, Jollu Shiva, Jollu Naveen and Chintakunta Chennakeshavulu – were killed in police firing on the morning of December 6, 2019, about a week after they were arrested on November 29. At the time the accused were killed, police had claimed that the suspects threw sticks and stones at them.
